name: Purple Love
description:
In a devastated land, you are a gentle violet and wants to reach your love. 

Explore the world  and discover new ways by pollinating around you. You’ll have to jump around while having limited energy. 

Try after try, memorise your path to finally be reunited with the flower of your heart <3

Controls:

  • Move: Arrows
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Respawn: C
  • Pollenize: X
  • In game menu: Esc

Made with Godot for the subOrbital Game Jam
